ceci-tts/description: Converts text into an audio clip using Google Translate
ceci-tts/attributes/volume/description: How loud do you want it to be?
ceci-tts/attributes/loop/description: Loop the audio clip when it finishes.
ceci-tts/attributes/speed/description: 1 for normal speed, 2 for double speed.
ceci-tts/attributes/text: I'm a text to speech converter!
ceci-tts/attributes/text/description: A text for your label to show up in your app.
